nodes.text: Oga Garra was the female Blutopian proprietor of Oga's Cantina, a drinking establishment in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu and was also the local crime boss. Garra was an orphan that was raised by the Hutts.

She took great pride in her cantina and the prestige she had. She was always looking for ways to improve her business. She was involved in almost all commerce that took place in Black Spire Outpost and she was feared and respected by all the locals.
